title: Kansas City Royals average ticket price 2006 to 2019
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: Overall Average ticket price in U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Average ticket price in U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2009 to 2011, gradually increasing from 2011 to 2018, and lastly roughly constant from 2018 to 2019.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2018.
The highest Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, of value 33.58 was reached at Year 2018
Minimum Average ticket price in U.S. dollars about 18.95 was reached at Year 2011
